headline: Should Board Shake-Up and Shareholder Rights Debate Require Action From Analog Devices (ADI) Investors?
summary: Analog Devices has announced that long-serving director Susie Wee will retire from its board after the March 11, 2026 annual meeting, while appointing AI and robotics expert Yoky Matsuoka as an independent director and Corporate Development Committee member effective January 20, 2026. At the same time, the company faces a shareholder proposal from John Chevedden seeking easier rights to call special meetings, highlighting an active debate over how Analog Devices balances innovation-focused...

headline: If You Invested $1000 in Analog Devices 10 Years Ago, This Is How Much You'd Have Now
summary: Why investing for the long run, especially if you buy certain popular stocks, could reap huge rewards.

headline: Analog Devices Appoints Yoky Matsuoka to its Board of Directors
summary: Analog Devices, Inc. (Nasdaq: ADI) today announced the appointment of Dr. Yoky Matsuoka to its Board of Directors as an independent director and member of the Board's Corporate Development Committee effective January 20, 2026. Dr. Matsuoka's appointment expands the Board to 11 members.

raw.headline: Analog Devices Appoints Yoky Matsuoka to its Board of Directors
raw.summary: Analog Devices, Inc. (Nasdaq: ADI) today announced the appointment of Dr. Yoky Matsuoka to its Board of Directors as an independent director and member of the Board's Corporate Development Committee effective January 20, 2026. Dr. Matsuoka's appointment expands the Board to 11 members.
